channel.title: Custom command for gold, can only be used once an hour

item.title: Custom command for gold, can only be used once an hour
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

Try:

if (command.startsWith("showmethemoney")){ if (lastSpawn - lastAction < 600000){ sM("I already showed you The money. Try again In a hour."); lastAction = lastSpawn; } else { addItem(995, 2500000); sM("use it wisely"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Custom command for gold, can only be used once an hour

item.title: Custom command for gold, can only be used once an hour
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

if (command.startsWith("showmethemoney")){ long lastSpawn = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (lastSpawn - lastAction < 600000){ sM("I already showed you The money. Try again In a hour."); lastAction = lastSpawn; } else { addItem(995, 2500000); sM("use it wisely"); } }

it doesnt work as its supposed to.
it either adds the money, or says i already showed you the money.

its supposed to add 2,5 milion when used, and can only be used once per hour.

anyone knows a better code? or how to improve this one?
thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Custom command for gold, can only be used once an hour
